fields.name: FailureCount
fields.description: Total number of times that the HelmRelease failed to install or upgrade

fields.name: HelmChartRef
fields.description: The reference to the HelmChart object used as the source to this HelmRelease

fields.name: InstallFailureCount
fields.description: Number of times that the HelmRelease failed to install

fields.name: LastRevisionApplied
fields.description: The revision number of the last released object change

fields.name: UpgradeFailureCount
fields.description: Number of times that the HelmRelease failed to upgrade
